reviewsJson.markdown:
**Vape Train Honeycomb**

**DISCLAIMER:** These are my personal notes that I am sharing with the community & palates are different.

**Setup:** Hussar RDA V1 Parallel N80 26G 6.5 wraps 2.5MM .3 ohm 35 watts

**Testing Info:** Steeped for 21 days Mixed 5,6,&7%. 70vg 30pg

**Vape Train's Description:** VTA Doesn't have a description for this flavor, but they suggest solo percentages between 5-10% & mixing between 3-5%.

**5%:** Smooth no harshness sweet and buttery. With some bakery style notes.

**6%:** Getting some slight harshness. Very buttery bakery type notes. fairly sweet guessing thats the honey part because i do not get a distictive honey taste. Medium bodied mouthfeel.

**7%** Bakery notes are more at the front now. Still got some buttery sweetness. The harshness is no worse than it was at 6%.

**Final Thoughts:** VTA's suggested percentages seem about right to me. I didn't get any werid off notes. Did get the slightest bit of harshness the higher i pushed it. This should have a wide range of useages in just about any bakery recipe. Although i didn't get any distinct honey flavor, so if you are looking to use it for a honey note in a recipe you will have to look elsewhere. This should pair up nicely with FLV milk & honey to give that honey note though. This at a fairly medium body mouthfeel at all the percentages i tested it. All & all this is a pretty solid flavor & made a pleasant single flavor vape.
reviewsJson.author: ebc88
reviewsJson.title: Honeycomb
